title: The Boy Who Flew With Eagles
description: Famine. A giant eagle. And a boy who would be prey. The book combines excitement, adventure, and the dream of all humans. To fly. Naa'ki, a boy snatched by a giant eagle, must use his wits and knowledge to survive. And to save his people and animals from starvation. To succeed, he will have to give up his future.
author: Ben  Woodard
